General.Name: Xinjiang West Animal Husbandry
General.Description: Xinjiang Western Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd produces and sells milk and related products in China. The company engages in the sale of breeding stocks; and provision of dairy, feed, beef, and meat products. Xinjiang Western Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shihezi, China.
General.Address: No. 28, Beiyi East Road, Shihezi, China, 832000
